description: An image-based transcriptomics or proteomics experiment. (Added in 0.0.22)

primary_images.description: Images that measure transcript or protein targets in one or more fields of view.

codebook.description: Json file mapping targets the their expected values across imaging channels and rounds.

auxiliary_images.description: Images of non-target data such as nuclei or morphological structures.

dots.description: An fov_manifest containing images of all spot locations per field of view. Used for spot finding.
